archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.langmaterial: Materials in this collection are in German.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Margarete Schütte-Lihotzky Architectural Papers must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Margarete Schütte-Lihotzky Architectural Papers, Ms2001-035, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains two exhibition announcements. One from 1993 and another in celebration of Schütte-Lihotzky's 100th birthday in 1997.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: IAWA Small Collections, Ms2009-054. Finding aid available on the Virginia Heritage database.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: International Archive of Women in Architecture (IAWA)
